item.title: The Political News That We're Googling Ahead of the Midterms
item.description: Below, I’ve sorted search traffic for “healthcare”,” supreme court“,”economy“, and”immigration” according to the days when each got the most relative hits. Aside from some blips in the news cycle, voters have been constantly concerned with immigration news in the US…

item.title: Women, Not a 'Liberal Tea Party,' are Changing the Democratic Party
item.description: Here’s the graph showing that ideological differences between the incumbent candidates in either district provide a compelling refutation of the flank-them-from-the-left hypothesis. Pressley’s victory could only be one from the left if Capuano was moderate-ish, like Crowley…
